title: Birds Aren't Real Founder Calls In, Amber Heard vs Johnny Depp, Avatar 2 - H3TV #35
description: Today we dig into the wild conspiracy world and have a call with the founder of the "Birds Aren't Real" movement! We also discuss the latest developments in the Amber/Johnny trial, debate the merits of Avatar as a franchise, discuss the fallout from the Bobby Lee episode, watch Cobra Tate's "diss" video on Ethan, & much more!
itunes:title: Birds Aren't Real Founder Calls In, Amber Heard vs Johnny Depp, Avatar 2
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
